fulltext:
LE VIET HOAN 
Address: Thu Duc house, Phuoc Binh, District 9, Ho Chi Minh city  
Phone: 0973 49 43 40 
Skype: hoan.le90 
Email: viet_hoan_as@yahoo.com 
Date of birth: April 04,1990 
Profile 
Senior Frontend with +6years experience and +2years fullstack developer. Love to work 
with cutting edge technology such as Angular 2+, typescript … in English environment 
where members communicate in English. 
Experience 
Senior Frontend, NashTech — 2/2016–Present 
- Join in all required phases from plaining, estimation, developing the 
implementation, testing for web and App in banking, finance, wealth management, 
insurance fields 
- Write reusable and testable code in AngularJs and Angular 2+  
- Lead a small team of 3 members 
- Communicated directly with clients to determine web site content 
- Technologies: AngularJs, Angular 2+, Jquery, Html, Css, Unit test, highchart 
Junior/Senior Frontend, OPSWAT-USS; 9/2014–1/2016 
- Developing responsive website which allows user can upload file and scan to 
prevent any malware 
- Customize highchart and build charts with Morrisjs 
- Write Japanese and Korean virtual keyboard by Extjs 
- Technologies: Html, JavaScript, Jquery, AngluarJs, Extjs. 
Junior Fullstack, Vidaltek;10/2013 – 8/2014 
- Developing website where customers can control and manage their items, pallets, 
shipments 
- Design database, query profiling and optimization 
- Build layout form psd file, implement functions  
- Technologies: PHP – OOP – MVC, MySql, Html, Css, Jquery, JavaScript, 
boostrap, Kendo UI, SVN 
Fresher/Junior, TMA solution; 3/2012 – 10/2013 
- Convert psd to html 
- Deploy VOIP system, network and modify database 
- Writing script for automate testing 
- Technologies: HTML, JavaScript, cucumber, ruby, SVN, Linux, Vxwork 
Education 
2008 – 2011: Student at University of Science Ho Chi Minh City  
2017: TOEIC 900. 2018: IELTS 6.5 
Skills 
AngularJS 
Angular 2+ 
Jquery 
HTML5, CSS3 
HTML, CSS/SASS 
Boostrap 
Unit test  
Git 
NodeJs 
MySql 
PHP 
Regex, lodash 
Unix/ Linux 
 - Have a high sense of responsibility   
 - Be willing to work overtime due to urgent tasks   
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
